Title: Learn To Ride
Description: It's time for you to learn how to ride!  Seek out Jartsam at the Cenarion Enclave in Darnassus.  Don't forget to buy your mount while you are there!
PortraitGiverText: Find Jartsam and learn how to ride a mount!
RewardText: Don't forget to buy your mount while you are here! You can buy one from Lelanai right here.
